statements.insert:
INSERT INTO PSP_Line_Info ( "UID", "AreaID", "AreaName", "SubstationID", "SubstationName", "Title", "DY", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "L6", "K1", "K2", "K3", "K4", "K5", "K6", "K7", "K8", "K9", "K10", "K11", "K12", "K13", "K14", "K15", "K16", "K17", "K18", "K19", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10", "Flag", "Code", "IsConn", "K20", "k21", "K22", "CreateDate", "K23", "K24", "K25", "K26", "K27", "K28", "K29", "K30", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M7", "M8", "M9", "M10", "M11", "M12", "M13", "M14", "M15", "M16", "M17", "M18", "M19", "M20" ) VALUES ( #UID#, #AreaID#, #AreaName#, #SubstationID#, #SubstationName#, #Title#, #DY#, #L1#, #L2#, #L3#, #L4#, #L5#, #L6#, #K1#, #K2#, #K3#, #K4#, #K5#, #K6#, #K7#, #K8#, #K9#, #K10#, #K11#, #K12#, #K13#, #K14#, #K15#, #K16#, #K17#, #K18#, #K19#, #S1#, #S2#, #S3#, #S4#, #S5#, #S6#, #S7#, #S8#, #S9#, #S10#, #Flag#, #Code#, #IsConn#, #K20#, #k21#, #K22#, getDate(), #K23#, #K24#, #K25#, #K26#, #K27#, #K28#, #K29#, #K30#, #M1#, #M2#, #M3#, #M4#, #M5#, #M6#, #M7#, #M8#, #M9#, #M10#, #M11#, #M12#, #M13#, #M14#, #M15#, #M16#, #M17#, #M18#, #M19#, #M20# )
INSERT INTO PSPDEV ( "SUID", "Name", "ProjectID", "ReferenceVolt", "LineType", "LineLength", "Flag", "OperationYear", "Type" ) values ( #UID#, #Title#, #AreaID#, #L1#, #L4#, #L5#, #Flag#, #L6#, '05' )
INSERT INTO LineInfo ( "UID", "LineName", "Length", "LineType", "Voltage", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField3" ) VALUES ( #UID#, #Title#, #L5#, #L4#, #L1#, #AreaName#, #L6# )
statements.delete: DELETE FROM PSP_Line_Info WHERE Flag = #Flag# and Code=''
statements.update:
UPDATE PSP_Line_Info SET "AreaID" = #AreaID#, "AreaName" = #AreaName#, "SubstationID" = #SubstationID#, "SubstationName" = #SubstationName#, "Title" = #Title#, "DY" = #DY#, "L1" = #L1#, "L2" = #L2#, "L3" = #L3#, "L4" = #L4#, "L5" = #L5#, "L6" = #L6#, "K1" = #K1#, "K2" = #K2#, "K3" = #K3#, "K4" = #K4#, "K5" = #K5#, "K6" = #K6#, "K7" = #K7#, "K8" = #K8#, "K9" = #K9#, "K10" = #K10#, "K11" = #K11#, "K12" = #K12#, "K13" = #K13#, "K14" = #K14#, "K15" = #K15#, "K16" = #K16#, "K17" = #K17#, "K18" = #K18#, "K19" = #K19#, "S1" = #S1#, "S2" = #S2#, "S3" = #S3#, "S4" = #S4#, "S5" = #S5#, "S6" = #S6#, "S7" = #S7#, "S8" = #S8#, "S9" = #S9#, "S10" = #S10#, "Flag" = #Flag#, "Code" = #Code#, "IsConn" = #IsConn#, "K20" = #K20#, "k21" = #k21#, "K22" = #K22#, "CreateDate" = #CreateDate#, "K23" = #K23#, "K24" = #K24#, "K25" = #K25#, "K26" = #K26#, "K27" = #K27#, "K28" = #K28#, "K29" = #K29#, "K30" = #K30#, "M1" = #M1#, "M2" = #M2#, "M3" = #M3#, "M4" = #M4#, "M5" = #M5#, "M6" = #M6#, "M7" = #M7#, "M8" = #M8#, "M9" = #M9#, "M10" = #M10#, "M11" = #M11#, "M12" = #M12#, "M13" = #M13#, "M14" = #M14#, "M15" = #M15#, "M16" = #M16#, "M17" = #M17#, "M18" = #M18#, "M19" = #M19#, "M20" = #M20# WHERE UID = #UID#
UPDATE PSPDEV SET "ProjectID" = #AreaID#, "Name" = #Title#, "ReferenceVolt" = #L1#, "LineType" = #L4#, "LineLength" = #L5# WHERE SUID=#UID#
UPDATE LineInfo SET "LineName" = #Title#, "ObligateField5" = #AreaName#, "ObligateField3" = #L6#, "Length" = #L5#, "LineType" = #L4#, "Voltage" = #DY# WHERE UID = #UID#

UPDATE PSP_Line_Info SET "AreaID" = #AreaID#, "AreaName" = #AreaName#, "SubstationID" = #SubstationID#, "SubstationName" = #SubstationName#, "Title" = #Title#, "DY" = #DY#, "L1" = #L1#, "L2" = #L2#, "L3" = #L3#, "L4" = #L4#, "L5" = #L5#, "L6" = #L6#, "K1" = #K1#, "K2" = #K2#, "K3" = #K3#, "K4" = #K4#, "K5" = #K5#, "K6" = #K6#, "K7" = #K7#, "K8" = #K8#, "K9" = #K9#, "K10" = #K10#, "K11" = #K11#, "K12" = #K12#, "K13" = #K13#, "K14" = #K14#, "K15" = #K15#, "K16" = #K16#, "K17" = #K17#, "K18" = #K18#, "K19" = #K19#, "S1" = #S1#, "S2" = #S2#, "S3" = #S3#, "S4" = #S4#, "S5" = #S5#, "S6" = #S6#, "S7" = #S7#, "S8" = #S8#, "S9" = #S9#, "S10" = #S10#, "Flag" = #Flag#, "Code" = #Code#, "IsConn" = #IsConn#, "K20" = #K20#, "k21" = #k21#, "K22" = #K22#, "CreateDate" = #CreateDate#, "K23" = #K23#, "K24" = #K24#, "K25" = #K25#, "K26" = #K26#, "K27" = #K27#, "K28" = #K28#, "K29" = #K29#, "K30" = #K30#, "M1" = #M1#, "M2" = #M2#, "M3" = #M3#, "M4" = #M4#, "M5" = #M5#, "M6" = #M6#, "M7" = #M7#, "M8" = #M8#, "M9" = #M9#, "M10" = #M10#, "M11" = #M11#, "M12" = #M12#, "M13" = #M13#, "M14" = #M14#, "M15" = #M15#, "M16" = #M16#, "M17" = #M17#, "M18" = #M18#, "M19" = #M19#, "M20" = #M20# WHERE UID = #UID#
UPDATE PSPDEV SET "ProjectID" = #AreaID#, "Name" = #Title#, "ReferenceVolt" = #L1#, "LineType" = #L4#, "LineLength" = #L5# WHERE SUID=#UID#
UPDATE LineInfo SET "LineName" = #Title#, "ObligateField5" = #AreaName#, "ObligateField3" = #L6#, "Length" = #L5#, "LineType" = #L4#, "Voltage" = #DY# WHERE UID = #Code#

UPDATE PSP_Line_Info SET "AreaID" = #AreaID#, "AreaName" = #AreaName#, "SubstationID" = #SubstationID#, "SubstationName" = #SubstationName#, "Title" = #Title#, "DY" = #DY#, "L1" = #L1#, "L2" = #L2#, "L3" = #L3#, "L4" = #L4#, "L5" = #L5#, "L6" = #L6#, "K1" = #K1#, "K2" = #K2#, "K3" = #K3#, "K4" = #K4#, "K5" = #K5#, "K6" = #K6#, "K7" = #K7#, "K8" = #K8#, "K9" = #K9#, "K10" = #K10#, "K11" = #K11#, "K12" = #K12#, "K13" = #K13#, "K14" = #K14#, "K15" = #K15#, "K16" = #K16#, "K17" = #K17#, "K18" = #K18#, "K19" = #K19#, "S1" = #S1#, "S2" = #S2#, "S3" = #S3#, "S4" = #S4#, "S5" = #S5#, "S6" = #S6#, "S7" = #S7#, "S8" = #S8#, "S9" = #S9#, "S10" = #S10#, "Flag" = #Flag#, "Code" = #Code#, "IsConn" = #IsConn#, "K20" = #K20#, "k21" = #k21#, "K22" = #K22#, "CreateDate" = #CreateDate#, "K23" = #K23#, "K24" = #K24#, "K25" = #K25#, "K26" = #K26#, "K27" = #K27#, "K28" = #K28#, "K29" = #K29#, "K30" = #K30#, "M1" = #M1#, "M2" = #M2#, "M3" = #M3#, "M4" = #M4#, "M5" = #M5#, "M6" = #M6#, "M7" = #M7#, "M8" = #M8#, "M9" = #M9#, "M10" = #M10#, "M11" = #M11#, "M12" = #M12#, "M13" = #M13#, "M14" = #M14#, "M15" = #M15#, "M16" = #M16#, "M17" = #M17#, "M18" = #M18#, "M19" = #M19#, "M20" = #M20# WHERE UID = #UID#

UPDATE LineInfo SET "LineName" = #Title#, "ObligateField5" = #AreaName#, "ObligateField3" = #L6#, "Length" = #L5#, "LineType" = #L4#, "Voltage" = #DY# WHERE UID = #Code#
statements.select: SELECT "UID", "AreaID", "AreaName", "SubstationID", "SubstationName", "Title", "DY", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "L6", "K1", "K2", "K3", "K4", "K5", "K6", "K7", "K8", "K9", "K10", "K11", "K12", "K13", "K14", "K15", "K16", "K17", "K18", "K19", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10", "Flag", "Code", "IsConn", "K20", "k21", "K22", "CreateDate", "K23", "K24", "K25", "K26", "K27", "K28", "K29", "K30", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M7", "M8", "M9", "M10", "M11", "M12", "M13", "M14", "M15", "M16", "M17", "M18", "M19", "M20" FROM PSP_Line_Info WHERE Title = #Title# and Flag = #Flag# and AreaName = #AreaName# order by convert(int,DY) desc,Title asc,CreateDate desc

SELECT "UID", "AreaID", "AreaName", "SubstationID", "SubstationName", "Title", "DY", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "L6", "K1", "K2", "K3", "K4", "K5", "K6", "K7", "K8", "K9", "K10", "K11", "K12", "K13", "K14", "K15", "K16", "K17", "K18", "K19", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10", "Flag", "Code", "IsConn", "K20", "k21", "K22", "CreateDate", "K23", "K24", "K25", "K26", "K27", "K28", "K29", "K30", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M7", "M8", "M9", "M10", "M11", "M12", "M13", "M14", "M15", "M16", "M17", "M18", "M19", "M20" FROM PSP_Line_Info WHERE Title = #Title# and Flag = #Flag# and DY = #DY# order by convert(int,DY) desc,Title asc,CreateDate desc

declare @s1 int set @s1=#DY#
SELECT "UID", "AreaID", "AreaName", "SubstationID", "SubstationName", "Title", "DY", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "L6", "K1", "K2", "K3", "K4", "K5", "K6", "K7", "K8", "K9", "K10", "K11", "K12", "K13", "K14", "K15", "K16", "K17", "K18", "K19", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10", "Flag", "Code", "IsConn", "K20", "k21", "K22", "CreateDate", "K23", "K24", "K25", "K26", "K27", "K28", "K29", "K30", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M7", "M8", "M9", "M10", "M11", "M12", "M13", "M14", "M15", "M16", "M17", "M18", "M19", "M20" FROM PSP_Line_Info WHERE Flag = #Flag# and DY>10 and 10000>=DY order by convert(int,DY) desc,Title desc,CreateDate desc

select "UID", "AreaID", "AreaName", "SubstationID", "SubstationName", "Title", "DY", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "L6", "K1", "K2", "K3", "K4", "K5", "K6", "K7", "K8", "K9", "K10", "K11", "K12", "K13", "K14", "K15", "K16", "K17", "K18", "K19", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10", "Flag", "Code", "IsConn", "K20", "k21", "K22", "CreateDate", "K23", "K24", "K25", "K26", "K27", "K28", "K29", "K30", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M7", "M8", "M9", "M10", "M11", "M12", "M13", "M14", "M15", "M16", "M17", "M18", "M19", "M20" from ( SELECT t1.uid as "UID", "AreaID", "AreaName", "SubstationID", "SubstationName", "Title", "DY", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "L6", "K1", "K2", "K3", "K4", "K5", "K6", "K7", "K8", "K9", "K10", "K11", "K12", "K13", "K14", "K15", "K16", "K17", "K18", "K19", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10", "Flag", "Code", "IsConn", "K20", "k21", "K22", "CreateDate", "K23", "K24", "K25", "K26", "K27", "K28", "K29", "K30", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M7", "M8", "M9", "M10", "M11", "M12", "M13", "M14", "M15", "M16", "M17", "M18", "M19", "M20" FROM PSP_Line_Info t1,PSP_PowerPicSelect t2 WHERE Code='' and t1.Flag=t2.EachListID and t1.DY=#DY# and t2.PicSelectID=#AreaID#
union
SELECT t1.uid as "UID", "AreaID", "AreaName", "SubstationID", "SubstationName", "Title", "DY", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "L6", "K1", "K2", "K3", "K4", "K5", "K6", "K7", "K8", "K9", "K10", "K11", "K12", "K13", "K14", "K15", "K16", "K17", "K18", "K19", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10", "Flag", "Code", "IsConn", "K20", "k21", "K22", "CreateDate", "K23", "K24", "K25", "K26", "K27", "K28", "K29", "K30", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M7", "M8", "M9", "M10", "M11", "M12", "M13", "M14", "M15", "M16", "M17", "M18", "M19", "M20" FROM PSP_Line_Info t1,PSP_PowerPicSelect t2,lineinfo t3 WHERE t1.Flag=t2.EachListID and t1.code=t3.uid and t3.eleid='' and t1.DY=#DY# and t2.PicSelectID=#AreaID# ) as ss order by AreaName,SubstationName,Title
